summary:
More than 15 years of experience in creating and managing  Brand communication, advertising  and marketing plans (above and below, online and offline), from strategic proposal  to budget efficiency and  final results analysis (Kpi´s – ROI)  for several types of brands (local and multinational)
Extensive knowledge on branding,  brand values, brand Image, 360 marketing plans / campaigns, consumer profiles, influencers, traditional, non-traditional and digital media marketing campaigns.  
Proven leadership, work efficiency and strong project management skills.
A tireless activist and fighter against gender violence, Author of the most read blog on this subject in Bolivia.

•	Project management of the client’s campaigns
•	Image and advertising plans for  the company in Bolivia', 'title': 'Project Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1830230, 'name': 'TAG SRL', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFg29XMV6oPfg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519911132473?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=F6J1a5Ma2JGG6-f5mgp239XziVgnWJ-zpJdJpsngHy8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/tag-srl/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Santa Cruz, Bolivia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'TAG SRL', 'description': 'TAG is an advertising agency specialized in BTL Marketing Experience and Digital Marketing that works with the most important brands in the country. •	Strategy, planning and managing campaigns  for Bolivian subsidiaries of international corporations (D&M, BMSC, Sony, Unilever, Kimberly Clark, Samsung, Red Bull, Singani Casa Real, CBN / ABInBev, VIVA).
•	Strategy, advertising plan and production management  of  Digital , ATL & BTL and social media campaigns, sponsors, budget and development campaigns of internationally renowned events (Ultra Music Festival, Life in Color, Pacha)

Mindcode has worked on projects and research for a third of the 500 FORBES companies in the world while operating in 7 countries, including Bolivia

•	Analysis of brands, symbolic code and cultural behavior
•	Visual and cultural anthropology analysis', 'title': 'Strategy Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 11288271, 'name': 'Mccann Bolivia', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQG52yCCuPflGQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1656692945759?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=k92Zyen6gEbVyXLn4HEXFJhtOYp-ryFPhNT3YHN9aSg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mccannbolivia/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Santa Cruz Bolivia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'McCann Bolivia', 'description': "Strategic management of brands for multinational clients, our work included brand architecture, brand planning, consumer knowledge, brand's annual advertising (ATL, BTL and Digital) plan.
